Name: hin-muhammadfarooqk-la
Author: Muhammad Farooq Khan And Muhammad Ahmed

Translations.Text: jo apanee namaazon mein vinamrata apanaate hai
aur jo vyarth baaton se pahaloo bachaate hai
aur jo zakaat ada karate hai
aur jo apane guptaangon kee raksha karate hai
sivaay is soorat ke ki apanee patni yon ya laundiyon ke paas jaen ki isapar ve nindaneey nahin hai
parantu jo koee isake atirikt kuchh aur chaahe to aise hee log seema ullanghan karanevaale hai.
aur jo apanee amaanaton aur apanee pratigya ka dhyaan rakhate hai
aur jo apanee namaazon kee raksha karate hain
jo firadaus kee viraasat paenge. ve usamen sadaiv rahenge
hamane manushy ko mittee ke sat se banaaya
phir hamane use ek surakshit thaharane kee jagah tapakee huee boond banaakar rakha

phir hamane us boond ko lothade ka roop diya; phir hamane us lothade ko botee ka roop diya; phir hamane un haddiyon par maans chadhaaya; phir hamane use ek doosara hee sarjan roop dekar khada kiya. atah bahut hee barakatavaala hai allaah, sabase uttam srashta
phir qiyaamat ke din tum nishchay hee uthae jaoge
aur hamane tumhaare oopar saat raaste banae hai. aur ham srshti-kaary se gaafil nahin
